summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1621, for the improvement of the alley in block 19, A. A. Denny's Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley between Pike Street and Westlake Avenue, 4th Avenue and 5th Avenue, by paving the same with asphalt laid upon a proper concrete foundation, and by constructing all necessary catch basins, sewers, water mains and retaining walls, under Ordinance No. 17203 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
